data.name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Monstrum Troupe Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Put on a show Balduq will not soon forget with six vibrant costumes, one for each of your Monstrums!

Crimson King's "Monstrum Troupe" Costume
White Cat's "Monstrum Troupe" Costume
Hawk's "Monstrum Troupe" Costume
Doll's "Monstrum Troupe" Costume
Raging Bull's "Monstrum Troupe" Costume
Renegade's "Monstrum Troupe" Costume
